name: oddsumodd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c1)))

stmt.origin: mtbid(w0, wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cz))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(chash, c0))))

comment: If every term in a sum with an odd number of terms is odd, then the sum is odd. (Contributed by AV, 14-Aug-2021.)
